Articles.Content:
Sorry for my English!

One could add to the KSP an editor mode, where we could edit the names of the planets, create your own planet / moon, edit orbits, game textures etc ... ??? As an option cheat, more complex than the HyperEdit ??? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
you can edit textures and names of some planets from certain planet packs mods
